name: Tower Buster
description:
Tower Buster is a fun and addictive new game experience involving a tower of colorful bubbles which you must break down with more bubbles!


How to play:

-Keep your finger pressed on the screen to start aiming at the tower.
-Release your finger to throw your bubble. If your bubble hits another color matching one, all adjacent color bubbles will break.
-All other bubbles which are no longer being supported by the tower will fall down and earn points!


Features:

-An instinctive one-hand input controller.
-Attractive color towers and various structures.
-Fun and rewarding destruction animations.
